title: Los Angeles Olympics board of directors adds Trump allies Kevin McCarthy, Reince Priebus
text: President Donald Trump appointed Kevin McCarthy and Reince Priebus to the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics board after signing executive orders for women's eligibility policies.
summary: President Donald Trump appointed Kevin McCarthy and Reince Priebus to the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics board after signing executive orders for women's eligibility policies.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
